member.name: M:Framework.Unity.Pattern.SingletonMono`1.OnDestroy
member.summary: When Unity quits, it destroys objects in a random order. In principle, a Singleton is only destroyed when application quits. If any script calls Instance after it have been destroyed, it will create a buggy ghost object that will stay on the Editor scene even after stopping playing the Application. Really bad! So, this was made to be sure we're not creating that buggy ghost object.

member.name: M:Framework.Unity.Sound.Audio.SetVolume(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.param: How many seconds it needs for the audio to fade in/out to reach target volume. If passed, it will override the Audio's fade in/out seconds, but only for this transition
Immediately set the volume to this value before beginning the fade. If not passed, the Audio will start fading from the current volume towards the target volume

Whether the audio persists in between scene changes
How many seconds it needs for the audio to fade in/ reach target volume (if higher than current)
How many seconds it needs for the audio to fade out/ reach target volume (if lower than current)
How many seconds it needs for current music audio to fade out. It will override its own fade out seconds. If -1 is passed, current music will keep its own fade out seconds
The transform that is the source of the music (will become 3D audio). If 3D audio is not wanted, use null

member.name: M:Framework.Unity.UI.IUIManager.ShowUI(System.String,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: 显示（打开）UI窗体 功能： 1: 根据UI窗体的名称，加载到“所有UI窗体”缓存集合中 2: 根据不同的UI窗体的“显示模式”，分别作不同的加载处理

member.name: F:Framework.Unity.UI.UIFormType.Normal
member.summary: 普通窗体(一般指全屏窗体)

member.name: F:Framework.Unity.UI.UIFormType.Fixed
member.summary: 固定窗体（非全屏窗体，压在全屏窗体上面）

member.name: F:Framework.Unity.UI.UIFormType.PopUp
member.summary: 弹出窗体（模态对话框或者消息提示框）

member.name: F:Framework.Unity.UI.UIFormShowMode.ReverseChange
member.summary: 反向切换（界面需要出入栈）

member.name: F:Framework.Unity.UI.UIFormShowMode.HideOther
member.summary: 打开此界面隐藏其他界面

member.name: M:Framework.Unity.UI.UIManager.LoadFormsToAllUIFormsCatch(System.String)
member.summary: 根据UI窗体的名称，加载到“所有UI窗体”缓存集合中 功能： 检查“所有UI窗体”集合中，是否已经加载过，否则才加载。

member.name: M:Framework.Unity.UI.UIManager.LoadUIForm(System.String)
member.summary: 加载指定名称的“UI窗体” 功能： 1：根据“UI窗体路径”，加载预设克隆体。 2：根据不同预设克隆体中带的脚本中不同的“位置信息”，加载到“根窗体”下不同的节点。 3：隐藏刚创建的UI克隆体。 4：把克隆体，加入到“所有UI窗体”（缓存）集合中。

member.name: M:Framework.Unity.UI.UIManager.LoadUIToCurrentCache(System.String)
member.summary: 把当前窗体加载到“当前窗体”集合中

member.name: M:Framework.Unity.UI.UIManager.EnterUIFormsAndHideOther(System.String)

members.member:
Returns the vector rotated 90 degrees counter-clockwise. This vector is always perpendicular to the given vector.
The perp dot product can be caluclted using this: var perpDotPorpduct = Vector2.Dot(v1.Perp(), v2);
Returns the projection of this vector onto the given base.

Returns the rejection of this vector onto the given base.
The sum of a vector's projection and rejection on a base is equal to the original vector.
